entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][aot] Fails to compile `.bc` to `.o` for `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.0.Tests.dll.bc` due to `SIGKILL (-9)` #65411
  • Impact of changing MaxDegreeOfParallelism while running Parallel methods #65410
  • [API Proposal]: Getting the positive remainder (Mod) when dividing a number by another #65408
  • Installing the 6.0.2 ref pack MSI removes the 6.0.0 ref pack MSI #65407
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Rate Limiter #65400
  • .NET 6 slower than .NET 5 for relatively simple linq #65399
  • Add an analyzer that warns on single-use JsonSerializerOptions instances #65396
    Future
  • codegenarmarch.cpp:3201 Assertion failed '(gcInfo.gcRegGCrefSetCur & killMask) == 0' #65395
    7.0.0
  • [mini] gshared static virtual methods: asserts !sig->has_type_parameters #65394
    7.0.0
  • [mono] gshared calls to non-generic static virtual interface method throw BadImageFormatException: Method has no body #65384
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.Shared #65380
  • HttpConnectionPool violates HttpHeaders thread-safety for CONNECT tunnels #65379
  • Question about Process redirected output and WaitForExit #65377
  • Is there a way to read certificates from .p12 file and use them for an SSL/TLS communication while using SSLStreams? #65402
  • On modern runtimes, HttpClient.GetAsync is really slow to localhost, really fast to 127.0.0.1 #65375
  • [API Proposal]: FileSystemGlobbing FilePatternMatch.Index #65371
  • JIT: Expand GT_RETURN condition to GT_JTRUE #65370
    Future
  • [mono][interp] Implement tiering within the interpreter #65369
    7.0.0
  • JIT: fold unreachable cases for switch #65368
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #65383
  • Regressions in PerfLabTests.GetMember #65382
  • Can't use [JsonSerializable] with [Cloneable] source gen #65361
  • corerun debugger fails on exit with "debugger type: mixed (.net core)" #65357
  • [wasm][aot] Linking failing due to OOM for `normal-System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn3.11.Tests` #65356
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\MinLeakGen\\minleakgen\\minleakgen.cmd #65354
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexGroupTests.Groups failure on Windows Server 2022 #65353
  • Test failure profiler\\eventpipe\\reverse_startup\\reverse_startup.cmd #65352
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\cctor\\simple\\precise1_cs_do\\precise1_cs_do.cmd #65350
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Instantiation\\Negative\\Type_ofT_Inherit_FromT\\Type_ofT_Inherit_FromT.cmd #65349
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_18522\\GitHub_18522_2\\GitHub_18522_2.cmd #65348
  • WriteDump failed of dotnet-dump net 6 single file #65347
    7.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations #65342
    Future

Closed

  • OptimizedInboxTextEncoder's ctor makes it impossible to allow '+' despite UTF-7's removal #65130
  • Breaking change in environment variable configuration prefix support in dotnet 6 #61577
    6.0.x
  • Add support for IHostingStartup/IHostStartup in generic host #36394
    Future
  • Some regex optimizations are conflicting with each other #64991
    7.0.0
  • Thread starvation on high load with System.Text.Json #40072
    7.0.0
  • Who is locking the File? #65386
  • Enable build of Linux Arm64 RPM packages #64755
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: IPNetwork to support CIDR notation #64033
    7.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId returning false for an IANA timezone on App Service azure #64693
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers failing in runtime-extra-platforms #65019
  • Investigate ARM64 CFG failures when using the dispatcher #65111
    7.0.0
  • [Tests] System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected Unhandled exception Unstable on Windows 11 #65279
    7.0.0
  • Windows Update can seemingly corrupt .NET Desktop Runtime installations sometimes #65217
  • System.Xml.Tests.CNameTableTestModule.RunTests failure on Windows Server 2022 #65235
  • [wasm] Test AOT builds failing due to OOM #61339
  • [wasm][aot] Link step failing for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests` - `wasm-opt` getting killed #51961
    7.0.0
  • Regression: Bus error when running PublishSingleFile=true .NET 6.0 app on linux-arm (Raspbian) #62273
    6.0.x
  • Revisit the OpenSSL interop exception model #55973
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [MAUI][PERF] Reenable Maui w/o package injection #65409
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Ensure that tls_destructionMonitor is initialized if a thread is attached to the runtime. #65406
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable core dumps when running libraries tests on macOS #65405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix minor random bias #65404
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions` #65403
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • Revert genCall register trash changes from CFG PR #65397
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move more things out of Internal/Cryptography #65393
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix crashes when methods fail LLVM compilation. #65391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mini] fix static virtual constrained calls in non-generic interfaces #65390
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `push` for 8/12 byte struct args on x86 #65387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #65372
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • Changes to reduce committed memory: #65367
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated in R2R binaries #65351
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update main branding to preview 3 #65346
    area-Infrastructure
  • Gracefully emit a diagnostic when the GeneratedDllImport attribute didn't parse quite right and we don't have a valid AttributeData object #65344
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Remove ExactSpelling from GeneratedDllImport #65343
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Ask helix to run tiering test when it's requested #65359
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Couple optimization to MultiRegStoreLoc #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Add missing OP_RCONV_TO_I opcode. #65389
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Ensure that tls_destructionMonitor is initialized if a thread is attached to the runtime. #65358
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Clean unused files from emsdk when provisioning #65116
    area-Build-mono
  • [Android] Fix leftover direct invocation of clock_nanosleep #65373
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update library dependencies to the latest #65381
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change SslStream's internal adapter interface to use static abstract interface methods #65239
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Incorporate review feedback from #64646 #65376
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Improve regex optimizations around repetitions of the same character #65273
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • #51017 enable tests for android #64743
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-android
  • Remove default BuildInParallel attributes #65378
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable build of arm64 RPM packages #65345
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Include IsNetCoreAppRef in assembly version calculation for servicing #65166
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Remove JsonConverter.RuntimeType #65224
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Remove the concept of fat dispatch tokens and fat type ids from 64 bit platforms #65045
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't binplace Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator #65313
    area-Serialization
  • ILCompiler.Reflection.ReadyToRun shouldn't depend on type system #65355
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow tests to accept 800703E9 exit code too #65331
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixes for CFG dispatcher on ARM64 #65127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Resolve System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest SkipTestException failure #65322
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add a test for control flow guard #65122
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Validate `IntPtr` and ByRef field overlap #65246
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup some XML tests #65290
    area-System.Xml
  • disable GetGCMemoryInfo on FreeBSD #64937
    disabled-test, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix NonBacktracking hanging in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #65333
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Clean up a few confusing regex reduction tests #65334
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use StartsWith in regex compiler / source gen for shorter strings #65222
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Clean the OpenSSL error queue more consistently #65148
    area-System.Security
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [build] Move Mono API headers under src/native/public #64569
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Process.GetProcessById bugfix #64723
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Separate capturing from normal states in NonBacktracking #65340
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make sure we have GCGenerationRanges events when using Generation-Aware analysis on Linux #65338
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Explicitly check for TTL expiration when using Ping utility #65312
    area-System.Net
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64754
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Remove Unused Encoding on UriHelper #65330
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #65329
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Consider local var reads to be outstanding only if they are values #65309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Add linux-musl entry for FALLBACK_HOST_RID #65339
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] HTTP tests on NodeJS #65303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for interpreter stack overflow. #65315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] debugging some crashes #65178
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4 #65003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [release/6.0.2xx] source-build: Remove *.Razor.*.Tooling.Internal prebuilts #23959
  • Enable workload infrastructure to support multitargeting workloads #23951
  • Deps.json is not getting regenerated/rebuilt #23935

Closed

  • After update to latest vs for mac and latest SDK 6 for .net getting Unable to find SDK 'Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoImportPropsLocator' #23912

PullRequests

Created

  • Update CODEOWNERS #23956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename "NetSdkManaged" types to "FileBased" #23955
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix typo in UIChoice.cs #23945
  • reenable composite r2r singlefile test on OSX #23934
    Area-SingleFile

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #23832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1614470 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fix some pack tests and skip a failing test #22631
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783

Closed

  • Equality of nested readonly record structs? #5776

PullRequests

Created

  • Use better examples in pattern-variables proposal #5781

Merged

  • Record details on `with` for structs and anonymous types #5440
  • Create speclet for "extended nameof scope" #3059

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `args` in top-level program should be colored as a contextual keyword. #59569
  • Find All References to include external references #59568
    17.2
  • Missing important ways to fix ambiguity error in top-level program with implicit-usings #59564
  • The pre-selected "Suggest Name" for parameters has inconistent casing and violates .editorconfig #59562
  • `CSharpAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider` doesn't respect `PreferParameterNullChecking` #59559
  • [Unity] Telegram.Td.dll - Assets\Example.cs(4,12): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'Telegram' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #59557

Closed

  • Go to Implementation/Base to include external references #58147
    17.2
  • list pattern with conjunctive and pattern #58738
    17.2
  • Report Dictionary value assignment as Write instead of Read #46276
    Backlog
  • VB Quick Action, Generate Equal(Object) crashes #45919
    Next
  • Discrepancy between code metadata and behavior for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.BinaryOperator #59359
    Backlog
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 ("CompilerServer: server failed [...] Reached end of stream before end of read.") #59336
    17.2
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    17.2
  • TestGetAsyncEnumeratorPatternOnRange is flaky #58196
    17.2
  • "Generate GetHashCode()" is using System.HashCode when it's not available #45995
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete directory in semantic-snippets feature branch #59571
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59570
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Move RE0001 - draft #59563
    Area-IDE
  • Respect PreferParameterNullChecking user option #59561
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid loading assemblies that only contain IDE analyzers #59554
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59553
    Area-IDE
  • Do not remove parentheses from arithmetic ops in 'checked' contexts #59552
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitIsPatternExpression - add handling for list-pattern specific patterns #59285
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Make solution options global"" #59567
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add missing project references to Core deployment #59566
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix PythiaOptions #59565
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix Generate-Equals for VB when invoked on type header. #59548
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix warning on conversion of anon func with implicit parameters #59522
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59560
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Provide f1 help for discards #59543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59558
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Make solution options global" #59537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59556
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59555
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use GetBestTypeByMetadataName in 'use System.HashCode' fixer #59547
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59550
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59551
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59572
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: report error when no suitable length member #59475
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Produce better error for members in top-level main #59321
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for streamjsonrpc request handling #59510
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use segmented arrays for VirtualChar storage #59503
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server-Side sorta-kinda-breaks EF Core used in AuthorizationRequirementHandlers #40257

    6.0.x
  • Could we have Async validation in Blazor? #40244
  • Blazor Server - Ambiguous Routes when changing Base Path #40243
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.TestServer - Client hangs when writing large data synchronously #40241
  • SignInManager.GetTwoFactorAuthenticationUserAsync() returns null if called after a long wait after calling PasswordSignInAsync() #40240
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, multiple_queries #40239
  • Add an EventSource event when the server is listening for incoming requests #40238
  • OutputCaching Middleware #40232
    7.0.0

    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching should support response substitution #40230
    7.0-preview5
  • Output-caching has multiple data storage options #40229
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching entries can be purged programmatically #40228
    7.0-preview4
  • Output-caching should support tagged entries #40227
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching should support ETags #40226
    7.0-preview5
  • Output-caching can return stale results #40225
    7.0-preview4
  • Output-caching can lock concurrent requests #40224
    7.0-preview4
  • Output-caching entries can vary by custom values #40223
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching imperative configuration #40222
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching declarative configuration #40221
    7.0-preview4

Closed

  • Blazor & Custom Certificates #40144
  • CSS Hot Reload Causing Browser Link Error in JS Console in Browser #40189
  • Perf regression: json_netty #40193
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, json_actix #40192
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #40102
  • Allow customizing the cookie consent value #40164
    7.0-preview2
  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38879
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Multiple @page on razor pages #40132
  • Documentation on the steps to create a blazor webasm or server app from scratch #40236
  • Subscribe to Blazor Web Assembly AuthenticationStateChange Event #40163
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #40237
  • Kestrel memory pool does not reliably decrease with load #24958
    .NET 7 Planning
  • LogLevel Warning is somewhat verbose for UserManager #40160
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload related API should use platforms units for all platforms #4704
  • Fake issue #4703
  • microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm.msi.x64 missing version #4701
  • Include Signing Key to MAUI project #4700
  • Add doc comments for BlazorWebView public APIs #4696
  • Excessive space on the right side of a checkbox #4693
  • ViewExtensions.GetViewTransform should return transform to root rather than parent #4690
  • [Bug] Push to top using minus margin or TranslateY make CollectionView disappear #4686
  • Can not change the vertical and horizontal if the MauiSplahScreen #4684
  • RadioButton content truncated #4683

Closed

  • Trust anchor for certification path not found #4705
  • Unable to delete bin folder while VS is open #3468
  • Preview 13 missing Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration 6.0.2 mauipre.1.22012.15 nuget #4692
  • Visual Studio Professional 2022 Preview 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 throwing error on initial app start #3792
  • GetNamedColor - remove #3947
  • [Bug] OnIdiom doesn't identify Mac as Desktop #2423
  • [Spec] Finish up NavBar/NavTextColor implementation win WinUI and UI Tests #912
  • HTTP Image Caching Support #1966
  • ControlTemplates loaded from Styles fail to load correctly when not using XAMLCompilation #3793
  • MAUI adorner layer displays adorners in wrong place #4675
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Partial methods not compiling in MAUI Class Libraries #4666
  • Acces to unique ID of the device #4670
  • Images using URL for Source do not load on IOS #4231
  • [Android] Setting the BackgroundColor property in a ContentPage have not effect #4017
  • .NET MAUI Project referencing .NET MAUI Class library from a solution produces XA1018 error on build #3978
  • Unable to run Maui app in release mode #3910

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add retryCountOnTaskFailure #4707
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add GetHostedWindow #4706
  • Refactor Screenshot to use an interface #4699

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

    area/essentials 🍞
  • [ci] Try to install the android image #4691
    platform/android 🤖, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Use XamlRoot for GetViewTransform #4689
    partner/ui-tools

Merged

  • [tests] Add Task.Delay to some unreliable tests #4637

  • Try enabling FabricBot #4702
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Blazor Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4680
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Add ExecutionPolicy and NoProfile to powershell command #4678
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Essentials.MediaPicker refactored to interface and singleton #4663
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement image caching functionality for iOS #4515
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [X] Identify Setter property target in VSG case #4607
  • [iOS] Replace UIDevice.CheckSystemVersion checks #4635
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Remove IToolbar from IStackNavigationView #4654
  • [Android] Fix the math for GenerateAdornerOffset #4677
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4681
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [X] use compiled converter for Color #4687
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391

  • Update Android Gallery to use Maui #1558

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecutionStrategy does not apply to Migrate() and various other functions #27450
  • System.InvalidOperationException #27449
  • EF Core 6.0 cannot traslate DateTime .Date to SQL #27448
  • SQL Server: When retrieving generated columns in insert, concurrency may cause us to get the original generated value #27446
  • Regression in Compiled-Query-Cache #27443
  • sporadically EF Core returning incorrect data and throwing InvalidCastException #27442
  • Cosmos: Selecting complex properties (object or collections mapped as "OwnsOne" and "OwnsMany") makes the query return the entire document #27440
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Should Migrations create Indexes for BOTH properties of a M2M Skip Navigation Join Entity #27445
  • If Owned Entity Type is initialized from constructor on principal it is not being tracked #27444
  • How to query dbcontext for entries with modified properties #27441
  • FindAsync not return latest data #27432
  • Optimize hangs and stops responding. #27301
    6.0.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Unlink of file '.dotnet/dotnet.exe' failed. Should I try again? (y/n) #27451
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
    blocked

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27375 - EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27379
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] SQLite: Don't modify collection while enumerating inside ReclaimLeakedConnections #27428
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27356 - Collection_navigation_equal_to_null_for_subquery fails after merging from release/6.0 #27429
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
